programme.title: Operation Wild
programme.desc: Clare Balding travels to South Africa to join a veterinary team trying to help a rhino called Thandi who was attacked by poachers for her horn. For the first time, a plastic surgeon will attempt a skin graft on the animal to heal the wound. She also visits the rainforest of Borneo to follow the story of an orangutan who needs cataracts removing from her eyes so that she can be released back into the wild. Elsewhere, vet Steve Leonard takes a trip to Chicago's Lincoln Park Zoo, where the latest technology is being used to help chimpanzees with heart disease. He also visits the South African city of Pretoria, where a Cape fur seal requires a CT scan to identify the root cause of her illness, and a giraffe urgently needs to be anaesthetised to treat a leg injury.(n)

programme.title: Wild Arabia
programme.desc: Documentary revealing the connections between the wildlife, landscape and people of the Arabian peninsula. The first edition features animals including oryxes, jerboas, horned vipers and scorpions, and a journey with the Bedouin - camel-riding nomads who are the only humans to have mastered the art of survival in the desert. Narrated by Alexander Siddig.(n)

programme.title: Wild Arabia
programme.desc: Exploring the mountains of Dhofar in Oman, where the annual Indian Ocean monsoon has helped create a lost world of waterfalls and cloud forests filled with fascinating wildlife. The programme shows green sea turtles coming ashore in their thousands, shadowed by egg-stealing foxes, as well as footage of striped hyenas doing battle with Arabian wolves. Plus, a glimpse into the lives of chameleons, honey badgers and the elusive Arabian leopard.(n)

programme.title: Wild Arabia
programme.desc: The changes that have swept across the Arabian peninsula since the discovery of oil. Camel racing has become a hi-tech sport and the region's animals now live alongside a very modern society, but technology is also being used to protect nature. The programme reveals how dugongs are fitted with satellite transmitters and hunting falcons chase down radio-controlled planes, and follows the construction of the world's first carbon-neutral city. Narrated by Alexander Siddig. Last in the series.(n)

programme.title: Wild Burma: Nature's Lost Kingdom
programme.desc: Film-makers from the BBC's Natural History Unit and scientists from America's Smithsonian Institution venture into Burma's jungles to catalogue its species in the hope of getting protected status for the area. The team sets out to discover whether the mountains in the west are home to a population of Asian elephants that could prove critical to the survival of the species. Gordon Buchanan and Justine Evans search the valleys and ridges, while biologist Ross Piper follows up rumours of a second herd.(n)

programme.title: Wild Burma: Nature's Lost Kingdom
programme.desc: Film-makers Gordon Buchanan and Justine Evans head deep into the mountains of western Burma in search of the sun bear, the Asian golden cat and the clouded leopard. Meanwhile, zoologist Ross Piper and the science team carry on their mission to create a wildlife survey to present to the government of Burma, while undercover filming in a border town leads to a shocking discovery.(n)

programme.title: Wild Burma: Nature's Lost Kingdom
programme.desc: The team splits up to search for evidence of tigers, with Justine Evans and the scientists heading to the jungle of northern Burma. Gordon Buchanan travels to the forests of the far south, which were once home to a thriving population of the big cat, but as the area has been isolated by war for more than 60 years, little is known about the fate of the animals. Last in the series.(n)

programme.title: Men at Work
programme.desc: Two garbage men discover the body of a city commissioner and must keep it hidden and find the real killer(n)

programme.title: Total Recall
programme.desc: A 21st-century construction worker discovers that his entire memory of the past derives from a chip implanted in his brain(n)

programme.title: The Perfect Man
programme.desc: Hilary Duff stars in this comedy as Holly, a teenager whose lovelorn single mum moves the family including her youngest daughter to a new state every time she gets dumped, which is often. Their latest residence turns out to be Brooklyn, where the now thoroughly destabilised Holly decides that enough is enough and works to prevent mum from dating yet another local loser..(n)

programme.title: Ratatouille
programme.desc: A scrawny rat named Remy finds his dreams of culinary superstardom stirring up sizable controversy in the kitchen of a fine French restaurant. It's hard being a rat with culinary aspirations, but Remy is convinced he has what it takes to break the stereotypes and follow in the footsteps of star chef Auguste Gusteau(n)

programme.title: The Cable Guy
programme.desc: Life goes haywire for yuppie Matthew Broderick when manic TV man Jim Carrey knocks on the door. He wanted an installer, not a stalker! Ace Ventura with a dark side(n)

programme.title: Small Town Saturday Night
programme.desc: An aspiring country music star becomes torn between the woman he loves and his dreams of success in this drama from first time writer/director Ryan Craig. A talented singer/songwriter from a small town, Rhett (Chris Pine) is preparing to leave for Nashville when his girlfriend Samantha (Bre Blair) expresses doubts about their future together. When Rhett ponders ditching his music career in favor of staying with Samantha, his friends try to convince him that this may be sacrificing his one shot at fame for something that might not even last. Meanwhile, the decisions that both Rhett and Samantha make have a profound impact on the friends and family members who continue to support them no matter which path they choose(n)

programme.title: The Pillars of the Earth
programme.desc: Legacy. Waleran and Regan work toward a prisoner exchange in hopes of remaining on the victorious side of the war; Tom wants Alfred and Jack to become friends, but their work and love lives get in the way. Meanwhile, William's plan to thwart Aliena involves attacking Kingsbridge; Prior Philip and the Hamleighs receive rights to Shiring lands, but it comes with a steep price(n)

programme.title: Bless the Child
programme.desc: Brooding thriller: a New York nurse whose sister vanished in suspicious circumstances fights to protect the girl's surviving daughter. She realises that little Cody has particular powers, and that she is the target for a group of satanists(n)

programme.title: The Devil's Rejects
programme.desc: Hard-rocking musician Rob Zombie wrote and directed this intense, splendidly gruesome horror movie, a sequel to Zombie's "House of 1000 Corpses." Three psychopathic family members go on a gory killing spree as a vengeful sheriff tracks their trail. Zombie also co-produced and provided original music(n)

programme.title: Men at Work
programme.desc: Two garbage men discover the body of a city commissioner and must keep it hidden and find the real killer(n)

programme.title: The Cable Guy
programme.desc: Life goes haywire for yuppie Matthew Broderick when manic TV man Jim Carrey knocks on the door. He wanted an installer, not a stalker! Ace Ventura with a dark side(n)

programme.title: Jaws
programme.desc: Steven Spielberg's terrifying masterpiece about a coastal community plagued by a killer shark. With the summer tourist season at hand, the mayor is keen to keep the first attack hushed up. But when an expert claims that the attacks are the work of a giant Great White, there is only one solution - to kill the monster fish before it can feed again. Based on Peter Benchley's best-seller, three sequels and numerous imitators followed. Steven Spielberg(n)

programme.title: Anaconda
programme.desc: Film-makers venture deep into the Amazon jungle to document the lives of a remote tribe. However, the expedition is hijacked by a crazed hunter who plans to use them as bait to catch a gigantic killer snake. Adventure, starring Jennifer Lopez, Jon Voight, Ice Cube, Eric Stoltz and Jonathan Hyde(n)

programme.title: Total Recall
programme.desc: A 21st-century construction worker discovers that his entire memory of the past derives from a chip implanted in his brain(n)

programme.desc: A minor-league catcher and a baseball groupie team to help a talented young pitcher make it to the big leagues, and fall in love in the process(n)

programme.title: Rocky II
programme.desc: Sequel to the 1976 Oscar-winning favourite which catapulted Sylvester Stallone to megastardom. Things are looking grim for the Philadelphia boxer, his wife is in a post-natal coma, and he has an eye injury that could cost him his sight. But his heavyweight-champion rival's pride is still smarting from their first bout, and he wants a rematch with the Italian Stallion(n)

programme.title: Sweet Home Alabama
programme.desc: Reese Witherspoon stars in an excellent romantic comedy. A New York fashion designer must confront her southern past, and redneck husband, if she is to wed her new beau(n)

programme.title: Moonstruck
programme.desc: Cher won an Oscar for her portrayal of a young Italian-American widow who is swept off her feet by her fiancee's brother (Nicolas Cage). This multi-Oscar-winning romantic comedy is a delight(n)

programme.title: Bull Durham
programme.desc: A minor-league catcher and a baseball groupie team to help a talented young pitcher make it to the big leagues, and fall in love in the process(n)

programme.title: Crocodile Dundee II
programme.desc: Paul Hogan stars as Mick Crocodile Dundee. After falling in love with Sue in New York, Mick takes her back to the outback(n)

programme.title: Anaconda
programme.desc: Film-makers venture deep into the Amazon jungle to document the lives of a remote tribe. However, the expedition is hijacked by a crazed hunter who plans to use them as bait to catch a gigantic killer snake. Adventure, starring Jennifer Lopez, Jon Voight, Ice Cube, Eric Stoltz and Jonathan Hyde(n)

programme.title: The Perfect Guy
programme.desc: A successful lobbyist jumps into a new relationship shortly after breaking up with her noncommittal boyfriend. But when her ex resurfaces she soon realises that one of the two men is not who he appears to be(n)

programme.title: Dodgeball: A True Underdog Story
programme.desc: Unless he comes up with $50,000, Peter and his Average Joe's Gym will be swallowed up by White Goodman's bodybuilding empire. His only chance is to take a team of no-hopers to the national dodgeball finals, and a bruising showdown with White(n)

programme.title: Sorority Boys
programme.desc: If Mel Gibson had to get inside the mind of women to respect and understand them, in this teenage film the main characters will have to dress up as such to be able to do the same. Adam, Dave and Doofer are three college students who, after being thrown out of their brotherhood, find refuge in a neighboring sisterhood, made up of… feminists. To secure their space there they must dress up and keep a low profile. Until now, they had been cruel to girls, but this soon changes(n)

programme.title: Thick as Thieves
programme.desc: Before he retires, veteran thief Keith Ripley wants to pull off one last job so he can repay his debt to the Russian mob. He enlists the help of talented pilferer Gabriel Martin and the pair devise a strategy to steal two extremely valuable Fabergé eggs(n)

programme.title: Ghost Town Renegades
programme.desc: "King of the Bullwhip" Lash LaRue continues lashing away in the PRC western Ghost Town Renegades. In this one, the Cheyenne Kid (LaRue) and Fuzzy Q. Jones (Al St. John) investigate mysterious goings-on in an abandoned mining town. The villains have suddenly taken an inordinate interest in the town's played-out mine, and it looks like the mine's rightful owners will end up getting the shaft. But Cheyenne wields his whip in the last reel, forcing the bad guys to cower in submission. The better-than-usual cast includes Jennifer Holt (daughter of Jack, sister of Tim) as the heroine and William Fawcett, future costar of TV's Fury, in one of his "grizzled" characterizations(n)

programme.title: Meet the Robinsons
programme.desc: An orphaned boy genius learns a priceless lesson about family when he is whisked into the future by a time- travelling teen(n)

programme.title: Eddie Macon's Run
programme.desc: Chase thriller in which a wrongly imprisoned man manages to escape and heads for Mexico, with a ruthless sheriff in hot pursuit. This adaptation of James McLendon's novel featured the film debut of John Goodman(n)

programme.title: The Touch
programme.desc: Peter Pau, the oscar winning cinematographer of Crouching Tiger, Hidden Dragon, directed Tian Mai Chuanqi (The Touch). Pak Yin-fay (Michelle Yeoh) and Pak Yeuk-tong (Brandon Chang) are siblings in a family of acrobats. Bad guy Karl (Richard Roxburgh) employs gifted thief/acrobat Eric (Ben Chaplain) to steal an item created in the 1200s. Eric is successful, but the fact that he is Yin-fay's adopted brother makes his motivations less than clear. While everyone attempts to possess the item, it is Yeuk-tong who ends up with it. He and his girlfriend take off with the object, with all of the other characters in pursuit(n)

programme.title: Windtalkers
programme.desc: During WWII, two U.S. marines are assigned to protect Navajo radiomen, who encode military messages in their native language(n)

programme.title: Bats
programme.desc: Campy horror flick about a scientist (Dina Meyer) and a local sheriff (Lou Diamond Phillips) trying to stop deadly and unexplained bat attacks in a small Texas town. Bob Gunton, Leon. Directed by Louis Morneau(n)

programme.title: Transporter 2
programme.desc: Frank takes a job driving the young son of Miami's anti-drugs tsar. Florida was supposed to be a holiday, but when Colombian killers kidnap the boy and frame Frank, he has to start taking life seriously one more. Martial arts(n)

programme.title: Eddie Macon's Run
programme.desc: Chase thriller in which a wrongly imprisoned man manages to escape and heads for Mexico, with a ruthless sheriff in hot pursuit. This adaptation of James McLendon's novel featured the film debut of John Goodman(n)

programme.title: Agent Cody Banks 2: Destination London
programme.desc: Family adventure sequel featuring fantastic gadgets, high-flying action and exciting chases. Frankie Muniz ('Malcolm in the Middle') plays the teenage spy, who is sent by his new handler (Anthony Anderson, Law & Order) to pose as a student at a London boarding school. The mission: to retrieve a mind-control device from a rogue CIA agent who is planning to take over the world. Hannah Spearritt ('Primeval', 'S Club 7') co-stars as Cody's Scotland Yard counterpart(n)

programme.title: Windtalkers

programme.title: Layer Cake
programme.desc: Lock, Stock and Two Smoking Barrels producer Matthew Vaughn kicked off his directorial career with this crime thriller starring Daniel Craig, Sienna Miller and Michael Gambon. Craig plays an unnamed gentleman drug dealer (well, all things are relative in his line of work) who, landed with an astonishingly lucrative job, spies his opportunity to retire relatively unscathed from the business. However, before he can do so, his boss Jimmy Price asks him to track down the missing daughter of another gangster, Eddie Temple, and as Temple's of an even nastier temperament than Price it's not a request he can easily refuse. And once he embarks on his task, complications begin to stack upon each other in much the manner of the confection that gives the film its title - though rather than some lovely sponge, cream and berries, this one consists of brutal henchmen, drug deals gone bad and violent bloodletting(n)

programme.title: Best of the Best 3: No Turning Back
programme.desc: When a group of white supremacists seize control of a quiet Midwestern town, a fearless martial arts master and a righteous sheriff team up to take back the streets(n)

programme.title: Love and a .45
programme.desc: Saga about fugitive lovers on the run from the police and assorted criminals(n)

programme.title: Bats
programme.desc: Campy horror flick about a scientist (Dina Meyer) and a local sheriff (Lou Diamond Phillips) trying to stop deadly and unexplained bat attacks in a small Texas town. Bob Gunton, Leon. Directed by Louis Morneau(n)

programme.title: Supercross
programme.desc: Two siblings find themselves competing on and off the racetrack in this action-packed drama. K.C. Carlyle (Steve Howey) and his kid brother, Trip (Mike Vogel), are both racers in the rough and tumble world of supercross, a revved-up variation on motocross racing in which specially modified motorcycle negotiate specially built dirt tracks that send riders through tricky twists and turns, over rough terrain, and off high-flying jumps. Both are talented racers, but K.C. has a wilder and more reckless approach, while Trip follows a more cautious path. A more profound difference between them arises when K.C. is offered a lucrative deal to ride for a factory-sponsored team; he takes the deal, and leaves his brother behind to race on his own dime. However, when an accident takes Trip out of the running on the supercross circuit, he and K.C. set aside their differences as Trip helps coach his older brother so he can succeed in his drive to the championship. Made with the cooperation of a leading supercross race promoter, Supercross: The Movie also stars Sophia Bush and Cameron Richardson as the brothers' love interests, and Robert Carradine as a determined race coach(n)

Westlake's only salvation, and his all-consuming purpose in life, becomes the successful pursuit of the synthetic skin formula. To finance his experiments, he takes on a shadowy, enigmatic identity--Darkman, a phantom figure who terrorises and steals from criminals in the night. programme.title: Burn Notice
programme.desc: Michael needs Madeline to get in touch with Barry so he can throw the CIA off their scent with a false money trail - but she is soon arrested by Olivia Riley. The team must get her out of trouble and obtain enough money to pay for their new identities. Michael has the idea to recover expensive merchandise from Calvin Schmidt's abandoned warehouse, and the others try to recover a piece of tech used for remotely disabling security systems - but the site turns out to be heavily guarded by the police.(n)

programme.title: The Closer
programme.sub-title: Till Death Do Us Part - Part Two.
programme.desc: Part two of two. Brenda has 48 hours to get her case back on track after Jonathan Shafer's alibi comes to light. Meanwhile, the future of her relationship with Fritz seems uncertain when he reveals a secret from his past.(n)

programme.title: The Closer
programme.desc: Part one of two. Brenda tries to track down a witness in Atlanta, and takes the opportunity to visit home. Detective drama, starring Kyra Sedgwick.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order: Criminal Intent
programme.desc: Part two of two. Goren comes under intense pressure when he battles his old enemy Elizabeth Hitchens, who embarks on a bloody campaign to discredit the detective and break his spirit. The struggle with his bitterest enemy will threaten his very survival. Olivia D'Abo guest stars, with Vincent D'Onofrio.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order: Criminal Intent
programme.desc: The team investigates the death of an ambitious architect with aspirations to design the new World Trade Centre - and discover he had a silent partner who may have been responsible for his murder. Crime drama, starring Vincent D'Onofrio, Kathryn Erbe and Jamey Sheridan.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Director Vance charges DiNozzo with a special assignment to go to France, locate Admiral Kendall's wayward daughter Amanda and bring her home. Arriving in Marseille, Tony immediately heads to the local NCIS office, only to find five dead agents. After eventually tracking down Amanda, the pair embark on a rollercoaster ride to the relative safety of the nearest NCIS office in Spain. Michael Weatherly stars.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Gibbs travels to his home town after hearing news of his father's death, while the team investigates whether a fire on a US Navy ship was accidental or planned. The vessel served as prison to several members of the Brotherhood of Doubt terrorist group, whom Gibbs was responsible for catching. After the blaze, two of those members are missing. Tony argues that Gibbs would want to know, but Vance does not want him disturbed at this difficult time. Mark Harmon stars.(n)

programme.title: The Closer
programme.desc: Part two of two. Brenda is forced to be creative when her witness remains hesitant, while the stress starts to get to Fritz. Detective drama, starring Kyra Sedgwick and Jon Tenney.(n)

programme.title: The Closer
programme.desc: The team is called in to assist with crowd control when a fire spreads through Griffith Park, but an investigation into the murder of a woman whose body is discovered in the chaos soon takes priority. Meanwhile, temporarily sharing an apartment with Fritz causes problems for Brenda. Detective drama series, starring Kyra Sedgwick.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order: Criminal Intent
programme.desc: Goren and Eames investigate the killing of two contact lens salesmen and a plastic surgeon, who are all murdered during what appear to be botched robberies. The detectives arrest a paranoid schizophrenic for the shootings - but while he is in custody, someone else dies. Crime drama, starring Vincent D'Onofrio and Kathryn Erbe.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order: Criminal Intent
programme.desc: The team is called to investigate a murder committed by members of a religious cult who believe the victim is the son of a woman with psychic powers. Bobby Cannavale guest stars.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Return of the American drama following the work of the Naval Criminal Investigative Service. Gibbs and McGee travel to Russia to escort a computer expert connected to classified intel. However, the mission is compromised and they are forced to go off the grid while being hunted by Russian mercenaries. Meanwhile, the team in DC frantically tries to locate the missing pair. Mark Harmon and Sean Murray star.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The team investigates the death of a Navy Lieutenant who has been murdered while on his way to a meeting with the President, and must ascertain whether the killing was part of a recent spate of muggings in the area - or a targeted hit to keep information secret. Starring Mark Harmon, Michael Weatherly and Pauley Perrette.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Bishop seeks vengeance for the murder of Qasim, her late boyfriend, as Gibbs and the team uncover a new lead in the Chen case. Plus, Torres shows off his pick-pocketing skills.(n)

programme.title: Ted
programme.desc: Mark Wahlberg and Mila Kunis star in Seth MacFarlane's irreverent and vulgar comedy-drama about the relationship between a man, a woman and the man's toy bear. The young John Bennett had such an unpleasant and lonely childhood that he wished his soft toy, Teddy, would come alive and be his friend. And to everyone's surprise it did. The walking, talking and wisecracking plush creature became an overnight sensation - even appearing on The Johnny Carson Show. But fame being what it is, Teddy's time in the limelight ended. Now, Bennett is a directionless slacker in his 30s and still inseparable from Ted. They share a fondness for booze and pot, but the cynical bear has also developed his own distinctive sexual peccadillos, which he indulges with prostitutes (while harbouring a deep resentment that he wasn't made with anatomical correctness). However, Bennett's emotional loyalty towards Ted faces its biggest test yet, in the shape of Bennett's girlfriend Lori. She feels Bennett needs to grow up - and choose between her and Ted. Meanwhile, the bear must deal with a fan who's stalking him(n)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.sub-title: Two Cars in Every Garage and Three Eyes on Every Fish
programme.desc: Two Cars in Every Garage and Three Eyes on Every Fish. One day, Bart Simpson (voice of Nancy Cartwright) is fishing along the river downstream from the Springfield Nuclear Power Plant, and catches a strange three-eyed fish. A reporter happens to be passing by, and writes a story about the mutant fish; inspectors from the Nuclear Regulatory Committee soon arrive in town, and are outraged at the shoddy state of the plant. Mr. Burns (voice of Harry Shearer) attempts to bribe them, which only makes matters worse. Homer (voice of Dan Castellaneta) mentions in passing to Mr. Burns that if he were governor, he could change the state's laws regulating power plants and stay in business; Burns seizes upon the idea and runs for office. For the sake of his job, Homer finds himself helping Mr. Burns, while Marge (voice of Julie Kavner) and Lisa (voice of Yeardley Smith) both support the state's longtime governor, Mary Bailey. Near the end of his campaign swing, Mr. Burns persuades Homer to allow him to have dinner with his family the night before the election as a publicity stunt. Marge and Lisa are not at all happy to be helping Burns in his bid for the governorship, but Marge has a secret plan to derail the Burns campaign. "Two Cars in Every Garage and Three Eyes on Every Fish" first aired on November 1, 1990(n)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.sub-title: The Old Man and the Lisa
programme.desc: The Old Man and the Lisa. Penniless from bad investments, Burns asks for help from Lisa, who turns him into a profitable recycler. But then Burns takes things a nasty step further to increase his dividends. Pro wrestler Bret "The Hit Man" Hart has a voice cameo(n)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Trash of the Titans. Looking to boost sales, Costington's Department Store invents a new holiday, Love Day, which prompts Springfield residents to buy one another gifts such as "Sir Loves-A-Lot, the bear who loves to love." However, all those boxes and wrapping paper mean plenty of trash, and Homer Simpson (voice of Dan Castellaneta), typically late in taking the trash out to the curb, curses the sanitation workers when they don't pick up his rubbish. The angry garbage men refuse to pick up the Simpsons' trash until Homer apologizes, which he's highly reluctant to do. Eventually, Marge (voice of Julie Kavner) apologizes on her husband's behalf, which leads to an angry confrontation between Homer and Ray Patterson (voice of Steve Martin), Springfield's sanitation commissioner. Homer decides to put Patterson out of business by running for sanitation commissioner himself, and after making a number of ridiculous promises and slandering his opponent, Homer wins the office. However, Homer's ambitious plans cause him to blow through his annual sanitation budget in less than a month, and to cover up his mistakes, he starts accepting dangerous waste from other cities until Springfield's landfills are overflowing. First aired on April 26, 1998, "Trash of the Titans" also features a guest appearance from Bono, The Edge, Adam Clayton and Larry Mullen of the rock group U2 as themselves(n)

Things go completely awry when Wyatt, desperate to win back Sabrina's love, takes Sabrina and Jimmy on a very scary ride(n)

programme.title: Raising Hope
programme.desc: Sleep Training. Burt and Virginia sleep-train Hope; Jimmy's new girlfriend introduces him to a strange beverage that takes him on a frightening trip(n)

programme.title: Raising Hope
programme.desc: Everybody Flirts...Sometimes. When Burt's flirtatious ways are exposed, the rest of the clan experiment with their own inner flirt. Jimmy and Sabrina become rivals as well(n)

programme.title: Raising Hope
programme.desc: Baby Monitor. Burt and Virginia go out of their way to intervene in the troubled lives of their neighbours. Guest starring My Name Is Earl's Jaime Pressly and Ethan Suplee(n)

programme.title: Labor Day
programme.desc: Fugitive Josh Brolin forces single mum Kate Winslet to let him hide out in her home, where she begins to see an unexpected side to him. Drama. Sex/violence/mature themes(n)

programme.title: Contraband
programme.desc: This nail-biting thriller follows smuggler Chris Farraday (Mark Wahlberg) as he faces ruthless drug lords, vicious criminals, corrupt officials and trigger-happy hit men in a bid to help his desperate brother-in-law settle a debt(n)

programme.title: Non-Stop
programme.desc: An air marshal pursues a hijacker on a nonstop flight from New York to London in this hair-raising thriller. When the mysterious villain begins killing passengers, the marshal becomes the prime suspect and must fight to clear his name(n)

programme.title: A Walk Among the Tombstones
programme.desc: A heroin trafficker whose wife was abducted and murdered hires a haunted private investigator to track down the men who killed her in this brooding crime drama(n)

programme.title: The Boy Next Door
programme.desc: In this provocative thriller, a lonely, recently divorced teacher has an affair with a much-younger man. However, their relationship takes a terrifying turn as he grows obsessed with her(n)

programme.title: The Boy Next Door
programme.desc: In this provocative thriller, a lonely, recently divorced teacher has an affair with a much-younger man. However, their relationship takes a terrifying turn as he grows obsessed with her(n)

programme.title: Archer
programme.desc: Legs. Krieger offers to make a pair of robotic legs for Gillette(n)

programme.title: Archer
programme.desc: Midnight Ron. Archer forms a bond with Malory's new husband, Ron Cadillac, during an eventful ride back to the city. En route, they are ambushed, picked up by a beer truck and encounter armed hillbillies in women's underwear looking for two males to star in a peculiar film(n)

programme.title: Muppet Treasure Island
programme.desc: A youngster finds a treasure map and joins an expedition searching for a famous buccaneer's lost treasure on an unexplored island. However, their mission falls foul of a band of pirates hiding out among the crew. Musical comedy based on Robert Louis Stevenson's novel, starring Tim Curry, Billy Connolly, Jennifer Saunders and Kevin Bishop alongside the puppet characters.(n)

programme.title: Paddington
programme.desc: An earthquake forces a bear from the Peruvian jungle to start a new life in London. He finds modern Britain to be very different from the stories told to him by his aunt, but makes a new home with a kindly family. However, a sinister taxidermist intends to turn him into a museum exhibit. Comedy based on Michael Bond's series of children's books, starring Hugh Bonneville, Sally Hawkins and Nicole Kidman, with the voice of Ben Whishaw.(n)

programme.title: Honey, I Shrunk the Kids
programme.desc: A professor invents a ray with the power to reduce objects in size. Unfortunately, his kids and their meddling friends activate it and are shrunk to microscopic proportions. When they are accidentally thrown out with the rubbish, the children have to contend with all kinds of animals and insects on their journey home across the backyard. Disney comedy, with Rick Moranis, Marcia Strassman and Amy O'Neill.(n)

programme.title: Home Alone
programme.desc: A boy has to fend for himself when he is accidentally left behind after his family jets off to Paris for Christmas. The youngster initially enjoys his freedom, but is soon forced to resort to ingenious booby traps to defend the family home from two dim-witted burglars. Comedy, starring Macaulay Culkin, Joe Pesci, Daniel Stern, John Heard, Catherine O'Hara and John Candy.(n)

programme.title: The River Wild
programme.desc: A headstrong white-water rafting expert embarks on a holiday with her family, but their fun comes to an abrupt end when two killers show up. The fugitives' only escape route from the law is down a raging river, so they take the woman and her son hostage to act as guides. Meanwhile, her husband desperately tries to keep track from the riverbank, waiting for his opportunity to launch a rescue attempt. Action thriller, starring Meryl Streep, Kevin Bacon, David Strathairn, Joseph Mazzello and John C Reilly.(n)

programme.title: Transcendence
programme.desc: A scientist working to develop artificial intelligence is assassinated, but his death provides the breakthrough he and his colleagues needed, as his own mind is uploaded into a computer system. Granted extraordinary knowledge, he begins planning to change the world for the better - with potentially horrific consequences for the human race. Sci-fi drama, starring Johnny Depp, Rebecca Hall and Morgan Freeman.(n)

programme.title: Extraterrestrial
programme.desc: Premiere. Five college friends spending a weekend in a remote cabin fear for their lives when they accidentally blunder onto a conspiracy theorist's land. The situation grows far more terrifying when a UFO crash lands nearby, and the surviving occupant comes looking for human prey. Sci-fi horror, starring Brittany Allen and Freddie Stroma.(n)

programme.title: The Crazies
programme.desc: The sheriff of a quiet little town investigates a series of unexpected murders, trying to work out what could have driven seemingly normal, well-adjusted people to kill. He discovers that a toxic chemical has turned many of the townsfolk into bloodthirsty maniacs, leaving those unaffected battling for survival. Horror remake, with Timothy Olyphant and Radha Mitchell.(n)

programme.title: Chalet Girl
programme.desc: A 19-year-old skateboarding champion gives up the sport as she struggles to support herself and her father. She gets a job working in a ski resort, where she feels out of her comfort zone in high society, but she finds a way to put her old skills to good use by competing in a prestigious snowboarding competition. Comedy, with Felicity Jones, Ed Westwick and Bill Nighy.(n)

programme.title: Rio 2
programme.desc: Parrots Jewel and Blu lead a happy life together in Rio with their three chicks, until they find themselves hurled into an expedition up the Amazon. The journey leads to an encounter with an old enemy, while Blu also has to win the approval of Jewel's fearsome father. Animated comedy sequel, with the voices of Jesse Eisenberg, Anne Hathaway and Jamie Foxx.(n)

programme.title: St Trinian's 2: The Legend of Fritton's Gold
programme.desc: The mischievous schoolgirls embark on a hunt for buried treasure after learning their headmistress Miss Fritton is a descendant of pirates. However, they face competition in the form of a dastardly lord eager to locate the loot for himself. Comedy sequel, starring Rupert Everett, Gemma Arterton, Colin Firth, David Tennant and Talulah Riley.(n)

programme.title: Fantastic Four
programme.desc: A scientist and four members of his crew develop superhuman powers after exposure to cosmic radiation on a mission to study an energy storm in space. Unfortunately, one of them chooses to use his new-found abilities for evil purposes, compelling the others to join forces to stop him. Sci-fi comic-book adventure, starring Ioan Gruffudd, Jessica Alba, Chris Evans, Michael Chiklis and Julian McMahon.(n)

programme.title: Airplane
programme.desc: The passengers on board an ill-fated airliner become increasingly jittery when the flight crew flounder during a food-poisoning crisis. As ground control personnel struggle heroically to ensure the plane lands safely, a traumatised war veteran must face his fear to take the controls. Spoof disaster movie, starring Robert Hays, Leslie Nielsen, Robert Stack and Lloyd Bridges.(n)

programme.title: The Day After Tomorrow
programme.desc: A climatologist warns global warming will soon result in destructive freak weather, or even another ice age. He thinks the world still has time to prepare for the worst, but the crisis happens almost immediately - and as storms, earthquakes and hurricanes strike in terrifying fashion, he races across America to rescue his son from a frozen New York. Disaster thriller, with Jake Gyllenhaal and Dennis Quaid.(n)

programme.title: Dog Soldiers
programme.desc: A run-of-the-mill training exercise turns into a bloodbath for soldiers on weekend manoeuvres in the Highlands. After rescuing the lone survivor of a massacred special forces unit, they are set upon by a pack of werewolves. Taking cover in an abandoned farmhouse, they are besieged by the creatures and face a battle to survive until morning. British horror, starring Kevin McKidd, Sean Pertwee, Emma Cleasby and Liam Cunningham.(n)

programme.desc: Having sampled some of America's most diverse dietary offerings, Jamie Oliver sets out in search of the country's cheapest culinary treats. programme.title: The Green Green Grass
programme.desc: Boycie and Tyler are united in their distaste when Marlene demands that the family pays a visit to her mother in Bournemouth. Elgin, Jed, and Mrs Cakeworthy take desperate measures when Bryan begins to mope as the anniversary of his fourth engagement to Myrtle draws ever closer. Guest starring June Whitfield.(n)

programme.title: Butterflies
programme.desc: Adam gets a job as a long-distance lorry driver, which proves a shock for his dad, while Leonard's attempt at a reunion with his wife is unsuccessful. Vintage comedy, starring Wendy Craig, Geoffrey Palmer and Nicholas Lyndhurst.(n)

programme.title: Sorry
programme.desc: Timothy has a wonderful dream, and resolves to turn it into reality, before his mother makes it a nightmare.(n)

programme.title: As Time Goes By
programme.desc: Jean becomes concerned that Lionel's new passion for model boat-building is not active enough, and decides to rouse him from his lethargy by inspiring him to write another book. Comedy, starring Judi Dench, Geoffrey Palmer and Moira Brooker.(n)

programme.title: Whatever Happened to the Likely Lads
programme.desc: As Bob's wedding day dawns, a frustrated Terry continues to wreak havoc on people who happen to be unfortunate enough to live near him. Comedy, starring Rodney Bewes and James Bolam.(n)

programme.title: Last of the Summer Wine
programme.desc: Compo decides to build a home-made trampoline following a trip to the seaside. Long-running comedy set in Yorkshire, starring Bill Owen.(n)

programme.title: Last of the Summer Wine
programme.desc: Howard has had enough of Pearl and decides to leave home for ever. However, he soon finds he misses her, so the trio try to reunite the couple. Long-running comedy, starring Peter Sallis, Bill Owen and Brian Wilde, with Robert Fyfe.(n)

programme.title: Last of the Summer Wine
programme.desc: Foggy decides to go trekking across the moors, but his adventure coincides with Auntie Wainwright's special offer of grocery delivery bicycles. Comedy, starring Brian Wilde.(n)

programme.title: Auf Wiedersehen, Pet
programme.desc: A British detective turns up looking for Moxey, and a vengeful Grainger tries to prevent the lads completing their reconstruction of the bridge - but Oz lures the upper-crust crook to America, where he finally gets his comeuppance. Drama, starring Tim Healy, Timothy Spall, Kevin Whately, Christopher Fairbank and Jimmy Nail.(n)

programme.title: As Time Goes By
programme.desc: Jean becomes concerned that Lionel's new passion for model boat-building is not active enough, and decides to rouse him from his lethargy by inspiring him to write another book. Comedy, starring Judi Dench, Geoffrey Palmer and Moira Brooker.(n)

programme.title: Sorry
programme.desc: Timothy has a wonderful dream, and resolves to turn it into reality, before his mother makes it a nightmare.(n)

programme.title: Last of the Summer Wine
programme.desc: Howard is forced to take drastic measures, threatening wife Pearl that he will leave home to join the French Foreign Legion. Long-running comedy, starring Robert Fyfe.(n)

programme.title: Last of the Summer Wine
programme.sub-title: The First Human Being to Ride a Hill.
programme.desc: Pearl confiscates Howard's bicycle, so Foggy suggests he gets another one that can easily be hidden by means of camouflage. Comedy, starring Robert Fyfe and Brian Wilde.(n)

programme.title: Last of the Summer Wine
programme.desc: Lieutenant Commander Willoughby takes an instant liking to Compo, Clegg and Foggy and offers them the chance to become extremely wealthy. Ron Moody guest stars.(n)

programme.title: Auf Wiedersehen, Pet
programme.desc: A British detective turns up looking for Moxey, and a vengeful Grainger tries to prevent the lads completing their reconstruction of the bridge - but Oz lures the upper-crust crook to America, where he finally gets his comeuppance. Drama, starring Tim Healy, Timothy Spall, Kevin Whately, Christopher Fairbank and Jimmy Nail.(n)

programme.title: Whatever Happened to the Likely Lads
programme.desc: As Bob's wedding day dawns, a frustrated Terry continues to wreak havoc on people who happen to be unfortunate enough to live near him. Comedy, starring Rodney Bewes and James Bolam.(n)

programme.title: Henry IX
programme.desc: Alastair agrees to take on the throne, to the outrage of his younger brother, while Henry employs increasingly elaborate deceptions to see Serena in private.(n)

programme.title: Only Fools and Horses
programme.desc: The Trotters go on a lads' day out to Margate with their mates, but things do not go as expected when their bus blows up, leaving them stranded overnight in the seaside town. Finding a room in the hotel from hell, the brothers are only too happy to go out and sample the local nightlife - and that's when Del-Boy gets a blast from the past. Feature-length Christmas special from 1989, starring David Jason and Nicholas Lyndhurst.(n)

programme.title: Mrs Brown's Boys
programme.desc: Agnes is upset that Trevor has decided to work for a mission project in Africa, and resolves to give him an unforgettable send-off to remind him of the loving family he has in Ireland. Cathy's family counselling session descends into chaos, Buster and Dermot land themselves in trouble because of a circus lion, and neighbour Winnie is delighted that her husband's libido has returned. Comedy, starring Brendan O'Carroll.(n)

programme.title: Bottom
programme.desc: After inheriting £600 the duo head off for a night at the fair. Richie's wallet is stolen, but that proves to be the least of his problems as a fortune teller declares that he is going to die in three nights' time. Rik Mayall and Adrian Edmondson star.(n)

programme.title: Bottom
programme.desc: Eddie and Richie agree to mind their landlord's shop - and end up irritating the locals so much they find themselves facing a gang of looters. John Wells guest stars, alongside Rik Mayall and Adrian Edmondson as the puerile flatmates.(n)

programme.title: Spaced
programme.desc: Two disillusioned twenty-somethings, one a broken-hearted skateboarder and comic-book artist, the other an aspiring journalist, are brought together by fate as they search for accommodation in London. Comedy, starring Simon Pegg and Jessica Hynes.(n)

programme.title: Spaced
programme.desc: Daisy and Tim throw a housewarming party to toast their new home, but find themselves being upstaged when Marsha's daughter Amber throws a bigger, louder bash upstairs. Comedy, starring Simon Pegg, Jessica Hynes, Mark Heap, Julia Deakin and Nick Frost.(n)

programme.title: Eddie Izzard: Force Majeure
programme.desc: A stand-up performance from the comedian, offering a glimpse into the mind of the master surrealist. The show was recorded during Izzard's mammoth 2013-14 tour, which saw him visit 27 countries across the world.(n)

programme.title: Bill Hicks Live: Revelations
programme.desc: A 1993 performance by the outspoken American stand-up comedian, recorded at the Dominion Theatre in London. Hicks rattles through his opinions and observations on Los Angeles, how much he misses smoking, politician George W Bush, the first Iraq war, the assassination of JFK, pop music, television and children on planes.(n)

programme.title: Nathan Barley
programme.desc: Pingu is broken like a rag doll and Dan discovers a way to destroy Nathan, who manages to worm his way into Claire's meeting with a TV commissioner. Nick Burns, Claire Keelan and Ben Whishaw star. Last in the series.(n)

programme.title: Gimme Gimme Gimme
programme.desc: In a bid to improve his social status, Tom throws a dinner party, at which he is invited to audition for a West End play, while Linda gets an offer she can't refuse from talent scout Suze. Kathy Burke, James Dreyfus and Su Pollard star.(n)

programme.title: Ever Decreasing Circles
programme.desc: Martin and Anne invite Paul and his new girlfriend to dinner, but no one expects his estranged wife to turn up as well. Comedy, starring Richard Briers, Penelope Wilton and Peter Egan. First broadcast November 4, 1984.(n)

programme.title: Ever Decreasing Circles
programme.desc: Anne goes into hospital, so Martin tackles the housework - but finds it is not as easy as he thought. Comedy, starring Richard Briers, Penelope Wilton and Peter Egan. First broadcast November 11, 1984.(n)

programme.title: The Two Ronnies
programme.desc: Vintage sketches from Messrs Barker and Corbett, including Spoonerism, Hampton Wick and music by Tina Charles.(n)

programme.title: The Two Ronnies
programme.desc: Vintage comedy from Messrs Barker and Corbett, including an instalment of Hampton Wick and sketches Elizabeth Ah Ah and Ronnie Barker's Yearbook.(n)

programme.title: Last of the Summer Wine
programme.desc: Howard is forced to take drastic measures, threatening wife Pearl that he will leave home to join the French Foreign Legion. Long-running comedy, starring Robert Fyfe.(n)

programme.title: Last of the Summer Wine
programme.sub-title: The First Human Being to Ride a Hill.
programme.desc: Pearl confiscates Howard's bicycle, so Foggy suggests he gets another one that can easily be hidden by means of camouflage. Comedy, starring Robert Fyfe and Brian Wilde.(n)

programme.title: Last of the Summer Wine
programme.desc: Lieutenant Commander Willoughby takes an instant liking to Compo, Clegg and Foggy and offers them the chance to become extremely wealthy. Ron Moody guest stars.(n)

programme.title: Only Fools and Horses
programme.desc: Rodney ties the knot with Cassandra, but Del has more on his mind than best man duties as the dreaded Driscoll brothers arrive at the Nag's Head baying for his blood over some stolen mobile phones. Comedy, starring David Jason, Nicholas Lyndhurst and Gwyneth Strong.(n)

programme.title: Only Fools and Horses
programme.desc: The Trotters go on a lads' day out to Margate with their mates, but things do not go as expected when their bus blows up, leaving them stranded overnight in the seaside town. Finding a room in the hotel from hell, the brothers are only too happy to go out and sample the local nightlife - and that's when Del-Boy gets a blast from the past. Feature-length Christmas special from 1989, starring David Jason and Nicholas Lyndhurst.(n)

programme.title: Only Fools and Horses
programme.desc: The first ever episode of John Sullivan's classic comedy, originally broadcast in 1981, which introduced the viewing public to the Trotter family. Rodney grows tired of being dogsbody to wheeler-dealing older brother Del-Boy and decides to set out on his own. David Jason and Nicholas Lyndhurst star, with Lennard Pearce.(n)

programme.title: Only Fools and Horses
programme.desc: Del and Rodney make a bit of cash on a used-car deal and decide to celebrate in style with a night out in the West End. Vintage comedy, starring David Jason, Nicholas Lyndhurst and Lennard Pearce.(n)

programme.title: Only Fools and Horses
programme.desc: Del gets his hands on a statue of a Hindu god - which plunges him into the middle of an age-old feud between rival families. Comedy, starring David Jason, Nicholas Lyndhurst and Lennard Pearce.(n)

programme.title: Only Fools and Horses
programme.desc: One of Del's old flames turns up out of the blue, so Rodney and Grandad resolve to extinguish any passion that might still be smouldering in the Peckham wide boy's heart. Vintage comedy, starring David Jason, Nicholas Lyndhurst and Lennard Pearce.(n)

programme.title: Only Fools and Horses
programme.desc: Del spots another sure-fire winner and decides to enter the highly profitable tourist trade - and with Rodney and Grandad backing him 100 per cent, he is sure his open-top bus tour initiative will be a massive success. Vintage comedy, starring David Jason, Nicholas Lyndhurst and Lennard Pearce.(n)

programme.title: Only Fools and Horses
programme.desc: Del-Boy acquires three tons of lead sheeting, which turns out to be a DIY nuclear fallout shelter, so he, Rodney and Grandad collect their sleeping bags and food and have a practice run to make sure they will know what to do if the Russians attack.(n)

programme.title: Only Fools and Horses
programme.sub-title: The Long Legs of the Law.
programme.desc: Rodney starts going out with a policewoman, much to the consternation of dodgy dealer Del-Boy, who is terrified that one wrong word from his little brother could see him banged up for five years. Vintage comedy, starring Nicholas Lyndhurst, David Jason and Lennard Pearce.(n)

programme.title: Only Fools and Horses
programme.desc: Del gets the chance to sell off a couple of antique urns - the only problem being that one of them contains the ashes of Trigger's late grandfather. Comedy, starring David Jason, Nicholas Lyndhurst, Lennard Pearce and Roger Lloyd Pack.(n)

programme.title: Henry IX
programme.desc: Alastair agrees to take on the throne, to the outrage of his younger brother, while Henry employs increasingly elaborate deceptions to see Serena in private.(n)

programme.title: Knowing Me, Knowing You - With Alan Partridge
programme.desc: Spoof chat show, hosted by inimitable sports presenter Alan Partridge, alias Steve Coogan. Alan's first guests include a punk band and a champion showjumper - but star attraction Roger Moore is conspicuous with his absence.(n)

programme.title: Knowing Me, Knowing You - With Alan Partridge
programme.desc: Minnie Driver appears on the spoof chat show as Playboy magazine's agony aunt, who has a book to promote and a surprising revelation to make. Alan's other guests include a magician and hypnotist and two of Hollywood's biggest stars.(n)

programme.title: Knowing Me, Knowing You - With Alan Partridge
programme.desc: Alan's guests include Europe's sexiest dance act, the incomparable Hot Pants, and singing sensation Gina Langland, who joins the host for a unique medley of Abba hits. He also introduces the audience to Alan's Big Pocket, and reunites the British women's hurdles relay team from the 1936 Berlin Olympics.(n)

programme.title: Black Books
programme.desc: Foul-tempered proprietor Bernard struggles to fill in his tax return after his accountant goes on the run. Comedy, starring Dylan Moran, Bill Bailey and Tamsin Greig, with Martin Freeman (The Office, Sherlock).(n)

programme.title: Black Books
programme.desc: Manny starts his new job at the bookshop, but has to deal with strange customers and a very peculiar boss - until Fran steps in. Comedy, starring Dylan Moran, Bill Bailey and Tamsin Greig.(n)

programme.title: You Gotta Eat Here
programme.desc: John Catucci presents a special edition for children, with food including waffles and meatballs at Vancouver's Scandilicious, and a panzerotti big enough for the family.(n)

programme.title: You Gotta Eat Here
programme.desc: John Catucci presents a special edition for children, he scoops up homemade sweets at Saskatoon's Homestead Ice Cream, and eats modern Indian food in Toronto.(n)

programme.title: The Great British Bake Off
programme.desc: The quarter-final of the competition sees the remaining amateur bakers tackle biscuit-based challenges. Their first task involves making a large batch of crispbreads - each of which must come up to Mary Berry and Paul Hollywood's exacting standards - before the technical challenge, in which they battle time and temperature to create a set of six chocolate teacakes. The last round sees the hopefuls baking and assembling a gingerbread house, before Mel Giedroyc and Sue Perkins reveal who has qualified for the 2012 semi-final - and who is going home.(n)

programme.title: MasterChef
programme.desc: Another batch of contenders enters the fray and takes a palate test, recreating John Torode's dish of noodle salad with chicken and crab - but without the aid of a recipe. This means the end of the contest for some, with the remaining hopefuls working at London's Mango Tree restaurant before heading back to the MasterChef kitchen to cook two courses to impress John and Gregg Wallace, in a bid to win a place in tomorrow's quarter-final.(n)

programme.title: The Hairy Bikers' Cookbook
programme.sub-title: Si and Dave Do Mexico - Part Two.
programme.desc: Part two of two. As their culinary voyage comes to a close, Simon King and Dave Myers venture into the mountains of Chiapas, Mexico, where they are invited to a traditional Mayan village to cook a pre-Hispanic stew. The duo reach Palenque, and with a backdrop of 2,000-year-old pyramids, they reflect on their experiences.(n)

programme.title: The Hairy Bikers' Cookbook
programme.sub-title: Si and Dave Do Turkey - Part Two.
programme.desc: Part two of two. Cooks Dave Myers and Si King continue their tour of Turkey by travelling on a road that borders Syria, Iraq and Iran. They find time to prepare a doner kebab and enjoy a massage before arriving in the town of Van, featuring bizarre cats, gargantuan breakfasts and a lake reputed to hold a monster.(n)

programme.title: James Martin: Home Comforts
programme.desc: The chef takes viewers on a culinary adventure as he prepares a selection of simple dishes using exotic ingredients, all from the comfort of the kitchen at his home in Hampshire.(n)

programme.title: River Cottage
programme.desc: Hugh Fearnley-Whittingstall continues his mission to follow a vegetarian diet for summer, but business at the farm carries on as usual - meaning he must still take two of his sheep to slaughter. He also accepts a challenge set by a local pub landlady to produce meat-free meals at affordable prices, and presents her customers with dishes featuring golden squashes and foraged mushrooms, as well as two unusual flavours of ice-cream.(n)

programme.title: MasterChef
programme.desc: Five more cooks compete for a place in the quarter-final, preparing a dish that represents who they are, before the three least successful hopefuls rustle up a different plate of food using the same main ingredient in the Reinvention Test. One cook is shown the door, and then the remaining four face the daunting task of preparing dinner for a trio of MasterChef finalists and runners-up. But which pair will John Torode and Gregg Wallace put through?.(n)

programme.title: MasterChef
programme.desc: The four heat-winners enter the quarter-final, in which they face the Critic's Brief. Guest judge Tracey MacLeod provides a simple instruction for a main dish - the twist being, the amateur cooks don't know who has set it until they face the Independent's restaurant critic to hear her verdict. It's then back to the kitchen to prepare a dessert, again based on MacLeod's brief. This time, the one that doesn't make the grade fails to reach the knockout week.(n)

programme.title: Food & Drink
programme.desc: MasterChef: The Professionals judge Monica Galetti joins Michel Roux Jr in the kitchen to demonstrate that healthy food can still be delicious. She creates a flavour-packed meal that is low in fat and carbs, while drinks expert Kate Goodman surprises them both with some tasty, healthy beverages using bitters. Journalist William Sitwell asks whether food intolerances are all in the mind and Michel makes a refreshing tuna tartare.(n)

programme.title: Peter Kuruvita's Coastal Kitchen
programme.desc: Peter discovers the secrets of bush tucker and creates dishes inspired by these ingredients.(n)

programme.title: Peter Kuruvita's Coastal Kitchen
programme.desc: Peter meets with a community of passionate local producers, showcasing some of the finest and freshest produce in Australia's Sunshine Coast.(n)

programme.title: Rachel Allen's Easy Meals
programme.desc: The chef prepares a selection of recipes for a romantic dinner, including spicy squid salad, pan-fried chicken with mango salsa, and a chocolate mousse cake. Rachel also visits the English market in Cork, and a group of school-run mothers try one of her recipes.(n)

programme.title: Rachel Allen's Easy Meals
programme.desc: The TV chef provides recipes for chicken noodle soup, fast prawn red curry, and cardamom and coconut panna cotta. The local lifeboat crew also tests out a dish while Rachel meets her favourite chicken farmer.(n)

programme.title: My Kitchen
programme.desc: Valentine Warner demonstrates from his home kitchen how to cook fantastic meals, including a power breakfast of kidneys with fried bread, smoked haddock custards and a Bloody Mary.(n)

programme.title: Inherent Vice
programme.desc: Paul Thomas Anderson adapts Thomas Pynchon's celebrated detective novel in this Annapurna Pictures production. Joaquin Phoenix stars as Larry "Doc" Sportello, a pot-smoking private eye at the tail end of the psychedelic '60s who investigates a kidnapping case involving his old flame Shasta Fay Hepworth (Katherine Waterston) and her missing sugar daddy Mickey Wolfmann (Eric Roberts), a powerful real-estate mogul. In the course of his investigation Doc butts heads with Lt. Det. Christian F. "Bigfoot" Bjornsen (Josh Brolin), a part-time actor with a palpable distain for the free-love generation, and a reputation for committing civil-rights violations. Later, as clues to Wolfmann's disappearance begin to suggest a conspiracy involving the FBI and a mysterious underworld syndicate known as the Golden Fang, Doc seeks the help of his lawyer Sauncho Smilax, Esq. (Benicio Del Toro) and Deputy D.A. Penny Kimball (Reese Witherspoon). Meanwhile, Doc also agrees to search for Coy Harlingen (Owen Wilson), a reportedly deceased saxophone player who may not be as dead as rumors suggest, and who seems somehow tied to the ongoing Wolfmann investigation. Martin Short, Jena Malone, and Joanna Newsom co-star(n)

programme.title: Slumdog Millionaire
programme.desc: Jamal Malik is one question away from winning 20 million rupees in the Indian version of the TV quiz show Who Wants to Be A Millionaire?. As he answers correctly one question after another, the producers suspect he is cheating and have him arrested. The police agents questioning him cannot believe that a slumdog like him can have the knowledge to win the prize and become a millionaire overnight. While trying to prove them it is destiny that placed him there, Jamal will take us back to the events of his childhood that have the clue to the answers. We will learn about how he and his little brother strived to survive in the mean streets of Mumbai and how he met Latika, his one true love. He entered the show knowing she would be watching it and now every question brings him closer to her(n)

Turning down offers from powerful corrupt companies who are rigging races, he wants to win for the honour of his small family racing business. To do so he enlists the help of mysterious one-time rival Racer X, but gets a surprise when he discovers Racer X's real identity(n)

programme.title: Saving My Tomorrow
programme.desc: Part Three. Part 3 of a six-part celebration of the natural world featuring children's thoughts on environmental issues, including plastic waste and deforestation. Also: readings by Alan Cumming and Laura Dern; an appearance by Pharrell Williams; and a performance by Pete Seeger(n)

programme.title: My Big Fat Greek Wedding 2
programme.desc: In this sequel to the 2002 sleeper hit My Big Fat Greek Wedding, Toula (Nia Vardalos) finds her extended family rocked by the revelation that her mother and father were never really married -- which, of course, requires an even bigger Greek wedding so they can officially tie the knot. Meanwhile, Toula struggles to spice up her marriage to Ian (John Corbett), and is heartbroken when her daughter Paris (Elena Kampouris) says she wants to go to a distant college in order to get away from her overbearing clan(n)

programme.title: Abortion: Stories Women Tell
programme.desc: American women share their experiences with abortion and the laws governing the procedure in the U.S. Many sides of the debate are examined, from women dealing with unexpected pregnancies, to care providers, to female activists hoping to sway national opinion on the issue(n)

programme.title: Cast Away
programme.desc: FedEx employee Chuck Noland lives his life by clockwork. But his promise to his girlfriend to be back from Moscow for New Year looks doubtful when a terrifying plane crash strands him on a Pacific island(n)

programme.title: Self/less
programme.desc: In this icy and stylish sci-fi thriller, a dying New York real-estate tycoon undergoes a top-secret procedure to transfer his consciousness into the body of a healthy young man, but he discovers that his new life isn't what he expected after severing ties to his old one and learning about the mysterious origins of his new body(n)

programme.title: I Am Legend
programme.desc: The film revolves around virologist Robert Neville, who is immune to a man-made virus that was created to cure cancer but has now killed 90% of the human population. He lives in New York and is working on the cure for the virus while defending himself against mutants that have been created by the virus(n)

programme.title: Gods of Egypt
programme.desc: A thief enlists the help of mythical Egyptian gods to overthrow a vicious ruler(n)

programme.title: Vice
programme.desc: Fast Food of Arabia & Nollywood. Gianna Toboni reports on the globalization of fast food and the expanding obesity epidemic worldwide; Thomas Morton explores the productive world of Nigerian cinema and even takes a turn in front of the camera(n)

programme.title: Mamma Mia!
programme.desc: Donna, an independent, single mother who owns a small hotel on an idyllic Greek island, is about to let go of Sophie, the spirited daughter she's raised alone. For Sophie's wedding, Donna has invited her two lifelong best girlfriends--practical and no-nonsense Rosie and wealthy, multi-divorcee Tonya--from her one-time backing band, Donna and the Dynamos. But Sophie has secretly invited three guests of her own(n)

programme.title: Just Married
programme.desc: Romantic comedy in which a newlywed couple on honeymoon in Europe discover that the girl's disapproving family and ex-boyfriend are following them in an attempt to sabotage their relationship(n)

programme.title: Hannah Montana/Miley Cyrus: Best of Both Worlds Concert
programme.desc: Fans of Miley Cyrus and her pop-star alter ego on her series Hannah Montana get the best of both worlds with this live concert film. Shot during her 54-city musical tour, this concert captures Cyrus performing both as herself and as Hannah(n)

programme.title: Ice Age: Collision Course
programme.desc: When bumbling squirrel Scrat accidentally sends an asteroid hurtling toward Earth, Manny the woolly mammoth, Sid the sloth and Diego the saber-toothed tiger embark on a journey with their animal friends to save the planet from destruction(n)

programme.title: Sesame Street
programme.desc: Make Your Garden Grow. Elmo makes sure his apple tree has good soil, water and sunlight, but still needs to learn to be patient and wait for it to grow(n)

programme.title: Sesame Street

programme.title: 101 Dalmatians

programme.title: Making of 'The Fate of the Furious'
programme.desc: A look at "The Fate of the Furious," a 2017 thriller that finds Dom being lured back into a life of crime by a mysterious woman who turns him against his own family. The film stars Vin Diesel, Charlize Theron and Dwayne Johnson, and is directed by F. Gary Gray(n)

programme.title: Real Sports With Bryant Gumbel
programme.desc: A look at the dangers of driving in the Dominican Republic and the deaths of several MLB players in accidents; a report on domestic violence in the MMA community; and a visit with two brothers who have overcome obstacles to compete in youth triathlons(n)

programme.title: The Fight Game With Jim Lampley
programme.desc: A look back at the March 18 title bouts of pound-for-pound stars Gennady Golovkin and "Chocolatito" Gonzalez; correspondent Melissa Stark travels to the boxing hotbed of Mexico to gauge who is more popular: Canelo Alvarez or Julio Cesar Chavez Jr.; and the latest news and events in the sport(n)

programme.title: Suicide Squad

programme.title: Slumdog Millionaire
programme.desc: Jamal Malik is one question away from winning 20 million rupees in the Indian version of the TV quiz show Who Wants to Be A Millionaire?. As he answers correctly one question after another, the producers suspect he is cheating and have him arrested. The police agents questioning him cannot believe that a slumdog like him can have the knowledge to win the prize and become a millionaire overnight. While trying to prove them it is destiny that placed him there, Jamal will take us back to the events of his childhood that have the clue to the answers. We will learn about how he and his little brother strived to survive in the mean streets of Mumbai and how he met Latika, his one true love. He entered the show knowing she would be watching it and now every question brings him closer to her(n)

programme.title: The Immortal Life of Henrietta Lacks
programme.desc: Aided by a young journalist, a woman searches for clues about her mother, who died of cancer in 1951 but not before samples of healthy and cancerous tissues were secretly harvested from her and subsequently used for medical research for decades to come. Based on Rebecca Skloot's best-selling book that took 10 years to research and write(n)

programme.title: Making of 'Gifted'
programme.desc: A look at "Gifted," a 2017 drama about a man doing his best to raise his 7-year-old niece, whose emergence as a math prodigy leads to a custody battle between the man and his mother. The film stars Chris Evans, Mckenna Grace and Lindsay Duncan, and is directed Marc Webb(n)

programme.title: Fool's Gold
programme.desc: How to Lose a Guy in 10 Days co-stars Kate Hudson and Matthew McConaughey re-team on the big screen for this adventurous tale about a treasure-hunting couple whose eight-year quest for the ultimate prize has left them flat broke and fresh out of gas. Ben "Finn" Finnegan (McConaughey) is a treasure hunter who has made it his mission in life to track down the Queen's Dowry -- a legendary collection of 40 chests filled with priceless treasure, and lost at sea in 1715. But in his single-minded quest to track down this sizable booty, Finn has sadly neglected his marriage to his loving wife Tess (Hudson). Tess has grown tired of the hunt, and now she's looking to start her life anew by going to work on the massive yacht of globetrotting billionaire Nigel Honeycutt (Donald Sutherland). But just as Tess begins to relish the freedom on her new, laid-back lifestyle, Finn uses his roughish charm to convince the adventurous baron and his debutante daughter Gemma (Alexis Dziena) that the elusive Spanish treasure is finally within reach. Of course no magnate in his right mind would reject the prospect of tracking down the most mythical treasure on the planet, and now as the hapless Tess is forced on yet another wild goose chase, her husband's former mentor Moe Fitch (Ray Winstone) and a greedy local gangster (Kevin Hart) up the stakes by joining in on the race(n)

programme.title: J. Cole: 4 Your Eyez Only, A Dreamville Film
programme.desc: A showcase for songs from hip-hop artist J. Cole's fourth studio album, "4 Your Eyez Only," features music performances and stories of hardship from residents in Baton Rouge, Atlanta, Ferguson, Mo., Fayetteville, N.C., and Jonesboro, Ark(n)

programme.title: American Psycho
programme.desc: Graphic violence and dark comedy color this adaptation of Bret Easton Ellis's controversial novel. A hotshot broker (Christian Bale) basks in the excesses of his late-1980s yuppie lifestyle, but behind his slick appearance lurks a soulless killer who's cutting a murderous swath through New York City. Contains footage not shown in theaters. Jared Leto, Willem Dafoe, Chloe Sevigny, Reese Witherspoon(n)

programme.title: Making of 'The Zookeeper's Wife'
programme.desc: A look at "The Zookeeper's Wife," a 2017 drama based on Diane Ackerman's nonfiction book about a couple who used the Warsaw Zoo to save hundreds of Jews during the German occupation of Poland during World War II. The film stars Jessica Chastain, Johan Heldenbergh and Daniel Brühl, and is directed by Niki Caro(n)

programme.title: The Green Inferno
programme.desc: After their plane crashes in the Amazon, a group of young American activists on a mission to save the rainforest are captured by a tribe of cannibals(n)

programme.title: Live Free or Die Hard
programme.desc: An old-fashioned cop emerges to foil a high-tech attack on the country's computer infrastructure as Bruce Willis brings back one of the biggest action franchises in screen history. It's been over a decade since audiences last saw New York cop John McClane (Willis), but now, as the world's greatest criminal mastermind (Timothy Olyphant) attempts to cripple the entire country with an innovative act of technological terrorism, only one cop can insure that the integrity of the system stays intact. In this, the fourth installment of the long-running action series, Underworld director Len Wiseman picks up the torch formerly carried by directors John McTiernan and Renny Harlin to helm a script penned by Mark Bomback(n)

programme.title: Making of 'The Zookeeper's Wife'
programme.desc: A look at "The Zookeeper's Wife," a 2017 drama based on Diane Ackerman's nonfiction book about a couple who used the Warsaw Zoo to save hundreds of Jews during the German occupation of Poland during World War II. The film stars Jessica Chastain, Johan Heldenbergh and Daniel Brühl, and is directed by Niki Caro(n)

programme.title: Hairspray
programme.desc: Tracy Turnblad dreams of TV stardom, and high school hunk Link Larkin. So when a detention encounter gives the wannabe teenybopper the dance moves she needs to make it onto the all-powerful Corny Collins Show, Tracy realises that her dreams could finally be coming true(n)

programme.title: Vice
programme.desc: Fighting Chances. A report on the popularity of a Senegalese wrestling style called laamb; a look at the impact of rising sea levels in Venice and the Maldives, an island nation in the Indian Ocean, and what could happen in New York if they continue to rise(n)

programme.title: Vice
programme.sub-title: Greenland Is Melting and Bonded Labor
programme.desc: Greenland Is Melting and Bonded Labor. Shane Smith goes to Greenland with climatologist Jason Box to investigate the island's melting ice and its effect on sea levels; Fazeelat Aslam reports on the brick-kiln industry in Pakistan and the conditions under which men, women and children work(n)

programme.title: Vice
programme.sub-title: The Resource Curse and Deliver Us From Drought
programme.desc: The Resource Curse and Deliver Us From Drought. Vikram Gandhi reports on a natural gas extraction project in Papua New Guinea and what it means for the future of the country and its people; Thomas Morton examines drought conditions in Texas and the solutions proposed by legislators, community leaders and citizens(n)

programme.title: Vice
programme.sub-title: Crude Awakening and The Enemy of My Enemy
programme.desc: Crude Awakening and The Enemy of My Enemy. Shane Smith reports on the lasting effects of the 2010 BP oil spill in the Gulf of Mexico; Ben Anderson visits Yemen to examine the rise of the Houthi rebel movement(n)

programme.title: Vice
programme.sub-title: Heroin Warfare and The Coldest War
programme.desc: Heroin Warfare and The Coldest War. A report on heroin use in Iran; a look at how climate change may be reigniting the Cold War(n)

programme.title: Vice
programme.desc: Our Rising Oceans. Season 3 begins with a report on climate change that features a visit to Antarctica to observe melting glaciers; and a report on rising sea levels in Bangladesh. Also: an interview with Vice President Joe Biden(n)

programme.title: Vice
programme.sub-title: We the People & Countdown to Extinction
programme.desc: We the People & Countdown to Extinction. Gianna Toboni explores the rise of militias in the U.S.; Isobel Yeung investigates the consequences of unsustainable fishing practices(n)

programme.title: Vice
programme.sub-title: The Post-Antibiotic World and Indonesia's Palm Bomb
programme.desc: The Post-Antibiotic World and Indonesia's Palm Bomb. The palm oil industry in Indonesia; and the search for new antibiotics are examined(n)

programme.title: Vice
programme.sub-title: Assad's Syria; Cost of Climate Change
programme.desc: Assad's Syria; Cost of Climate Change. In the Season 5 premiere, Isobel Yeung reports from Syria on the tenuous cease-fire brokered in 2016 after six years of civil war; and Shane Smith examines the first effects of climate change and projections of trillions of dollars in potential damage(n)

programme.title: Vice
programme.sub-title: When the Earth Melts & The Displaced
programme.desc: When the Earth Melts & The Displaced. Ben Anderson reports from the Arctic on the impacts of thawing permafrost; Gianna Toboni examines the plight of refugees trying to reach Europe across the Mediterranean Sea(n)

programme.title: Vice
programme.desc: Life Under Sharia & Plastic Oceans. Suroosh Alvi reports on the origins, acceptance and defiance of Sharia law in the Indonesian province of Aceh; Isobel Yeung examines the proliferation of plastic products in the world's oceans and what one 22-year-old Netherlander plans to do about it(n)

programme.title: Neighbors 2: Sorority Rising
programme.desc: Two years after feuding with a rowdy frat that moved next door to them, young parents Mac (Seth Rogen) and Kelly (Rose Byrne) are about to have their second child and move to a new house. Unfortunately, their attempts to sell their current home hit a snag when a sorority led by a rebellious college student (Chloë Grace Moretz) become their new neighbors. Desperate to get rid of the hard-partying gals, the couple forge an alliance with Teddy (Zac Efron), the former fratboy who tormented them the last time around. Directed by Nicholas Stoller(n)

programme.title: Making of 'The Boss'
programme.desc: A look at "The Boss," a 2016 comedy about a successful businesswoman jailed for insider trading who seeks redemption upon her release. The film stars Melissa McCarthy, Kristen Bell and Peter Dinklage, and is directed by Ben Falcone(n)

programme.title: The Boss
programme.desc: Hugely successful businesswoman Michelle Darnell (Melissa McCarthy) is convicted of insider trading and sentenced to prison. After being released, she is forced to move in with a long-suffering employee of hers (Kristen Bell), and tries to earn redemption and revamp her public image by helping a group of young girls in their quest to sell brownies. Peter Dinklage, Kristen Schaal, and Kathy Bates co-star in this comedy, which was directed by Ben Falcone (McCarthy's real-life husband), and co-written by McCarthy, Falcone, and Steve Mallory(n)

programme.title: The Nice Guys
programme.desc: A pair of detectives stumble upon a sprawling conspiracy while investigating the alleged suicide of a once-prominent female porn star(n)

programme.title: Midnight Special
programme.desc: In this cryptic sci-fi adventure from writer/director Jeff Nichols, Roy (Michael Shannon) rescues his son Alton (Jaeden Lieberher) from a religious cult in Texas, whose members worship the boy for his supernatural powers. Along with a state trooper (Joel Edgerton), the pair go on a cross-country journey as they are hunted by federal agents, who believe Alton might be a threat to national security. Kirsten Dunst, Adam Driver, and Sam Shepard co-star(n)

programme.title: Resident Evil
programme.desc: Alice leads a team of commandos into the multi-national Umbrella Corporation's locked-down bunker, which is controlled by the main computer, The Red Queen. The unit is sealed because of a virus that gassed all the staff but, as Alice and her team discover, the virus has re-animated them. Now, as well as facing the computer's weaponry, they must tackle the living dead to prevent the virus escaping into the outside world. Paul W Anderson's horror thriller is based on the successful computer game(n)

programme.title: Girls
programme.desc: Gummies. Hannah's mom comes for a visit, but is preoccupied with how to accept the next phase of her life. Meanwhile, Adam and Jessa start shooting their film, but clash over his creative direction; and a grieving Ray can't count on Marnie for support(n)

programme.title: Girls
programme.desc: Full Disclosure. Desi wants to bail on a gig that was planned for a birthday party for Marnie's mom in New Jersey. Meanwhile, Hannah turns down Adam's request to screen his film, but gets important advice from her dad and his new partner, Keith; and Elijah catches the acting bug again after helping a coworker with an audition(n)

programme.title: Girls
programme.desc: The Bounce. Elijah prepares for an open-call audition for a new Broadway show, but is distracted by an unexpected visitor. Meanwhile, a cash-strapped Marnie mulls pawning a family heirloom; and Hannah reconnects with Paul-Louis(n)

programme.title: Girls
programme.sub-title: What Will We Do This Time About Adam?
programme.desc: What Will We Do This Time About Adam?. Shoshanna helps Ray slog through his new oral-history project until a fortuitous encounter with her old boss gives their venture a much-needed boost. Meanwhile, Adam has surprising news for Hannah; and Jessa spends a day off on her own(n)

programme.desc: Goodbye Tour. Hannah has an important meeting and later reaches out to friends for advice, but has trouble reaching Marnie(n)

Of course no magnate in his right mind would reject the prospect of tracking down the most mythical treasure on the planet, and now as the hapless Tess is forced on yet another wild goose chase, her husband's former mentor Moe Fitch (Ray Winstone) and a greedy local gangster (Kevin Hart) up the stakes by joining in on the race(n)

programme.title: Live Free or Die Hard
programme.desc: An old-fashioned cop emerges to foil a high-tech attack on the country's computer infrastructure as Bruce Willis brings back one of the biggest action franchises in screen history. It's been over a decade since audiences last saw New York cop John McClane (Willis), but now, as the world's greatest criminal mastermind (Timothy Olyphant) attempts to cripple the entire country with an innovative act of technological terrorism, only one cop can insure that the integrity of the system stays intact. In this, the fourth installment of the long-running action series, Underworld director Len Wiseman picks up the torch formerly carried by directors John McTiernan and Renny Harlin to helm a script penned by Mark Bomback(n)
